game.player

Interface Strategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RandomStrategy, SmartStrategy

    public interface Strategy
    Interface managing the Strategies.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Richard, Julien

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] determineBase(Board board)
      Generates coordinates for the starting base.
      java.lang.Object[] determineMove(Board board, int colorAmount, Color firstColor, Color secondColor)
      Generates a valid move, or an empty array if no moves are possible.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Getter for name of this Strategy.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Getter for name of this Strategy.
        Returns:
        Name of this Strategy

      • determineBase

        int[] determineBase(Board board)
        Generates coordinates for the starting base.

        Should only be called once per game, at the beginning of the game.

        Parameters:
        board - Board to determine the base off of
        Returns:
        Array of coordinates to place the starting base on

      • determineMove

        java.lang.Object[] determineMove(Board board,
                                 int colorAmount,
                                 Color firstColor,
                                 Color secondColor)
        Generates a valid move, or an empty array if no moves are possible.
        Parameters:
        board - Board to determine move on
        colorAmount - Amount of Colors this Player possesses
        firstColor - Primary Color of this Player
        secondColor - Secondary Color of this Player, if applicable. Otherwise null
        Returns:
        Array of possible moves
